Papers
  • Integration of contextual-pragmatic and phonetic information in speech perception: An eye-tracking study. [paper]
    2019. Eszter Ronai, Yenan Sun, Alan Yu & Ming Xiang. Laboratory Phonology: Journal of the Association for Laboratory Phonology 10(1): 20, pp. 1–15. DOI: http://doi.org/10.5334/labphon.186
  • The morphosyntax of Chinese adjectival reduplication: The role of RED. [preprint]
    Yenan Sun & Jackie Yan-Ki Lai. To appear. Proceedings of the 49th Annual Meeting of the North East Linguistic Society.
  • Revisiting the Restrictive/Appositive Distinction in Mandarin Relative Clauses: The Confound of Demonstratives. [link]
    Yenan Sun & Jackie Yan-Ki Lai. 2019. Proceedings of the 93th Annual Meeting of the Linguistic Society of America.
  • Two strategies of samenss: Chinese tong and xiangtong. [link]
    Yenan Sun. 2018. Proceedings of the 20th Seoul International Conference on Generative Grammar.
  • On Apparent Parasitic Gaps in Mandarin Chinese. [link]
    Jackie Yan-Ki Lai & Yenan Sun. 2018. Proceedings of the 20th Seoul International Conference on Generative Grammar.
  • Two Kinds of Quantificational Domains: Mandarin mei with or without dou. [preprint]
    Yenan Sun. 2018. Proceedings of the 53rd Annual Meeting of the Chicago Linguistic Society.

      Talk given at ALC 13, Tucson, AZ.
